attributes.action: Stop selling Christian churches to property developers and private companies
attributes.additional_details: Religious land is sacred and should not be sold, renovated or demolished
attributes.background: Pass legislation that protects all religious land, assets and historical buildings

rejection.details: Rules about selling churches are a matter for the Church of England, provided they are Church of England churches. If you’d like to start a petition about banning other churches being sold that are not the responsibility of the Church of England, you could start a petition about that.
